text: {| |} HMS Scipio was a 64-gun third rate ship of the line of the Royal Navy, launched on 22 October 1782 at Deptford. She was broken up in 1798. Notable people who sailed on her include Matthew Flinders, Francis Laforey, John Nicholson Inglefield and Edward Thornbrough. ==Notes== ==References== * Lavery, Brian (2003) The Ship of the Line - Volume 1: The development of the battlefleet 1650-1850. Conway Maritime Press. . ==External links== * Category:Ships of the line of the Royal Navy Category:Crown-class ships of the line Category:1782 ships Category:Ships built in Deptford
title: HMS Scipio (1782)
